Header Module¶

class epyk.core.html.Header.Header(report=None)¶
base(url)¶

Specify a dedicated path for the relative paths in the page. Basically the images will use this path as base if present in the page

Usage:

Related Pages:

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_base.asp

param url

return

favicon(url)¶

The <link> tag defines a link between a document and an external resource.

The <link> tag is used to link to external style sheets.

Usage:

rptObj.headers.favicon('https://github.com/favicon.ico')

Related Pages:

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_link.asp

param url

return

property meta¶
Description:

Property to the Meta data dictionary for the HTML page

Metadata is data (information) about data.

The <meta> tag provides metadata about the HTML document. Metadata will not be displayed on the page, but will be machine parsable.

Usage:

rptObj.headers.meta

Related Pages:

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_meta.asp

rtype

Meta

title(value)¶

The <title> tag is required in all HTML documents and it defines the title of the document.

Usage:

rptObj.headers.title("title")

Related Pages:

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_title.asp

param value

String.

class epyk.core.html.Header.Meta¶
author(name)¶

Define the author of the page

Usage:

rptObj.headers.meta.author('epykure')
Parameters

name – String. The author name

charset(value='UTF-8')¶

Define the character set used

Usage:

rptObj.headers.meta.charset("test")

Related Pages:

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_meta.asp

param value

Optional. A String

custom(name, content)¶

Bespoke function to add other meta tags

Usage:

rptObj.headers.meta.custom('language', 'python')
Parameters

  • name – String.

  • content – String.

description(value)¶

Define a description of your web page

Usage:

rptObj.headers.meta.description('This is a description')

Related Pages:

https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_head.asp

param value

String. The report description

http_equiv(name, content)¶

Bespoke function to add other http-equiv tags to the meta section

Usage:

rptObj.headers.meta.http_equiv('language', 'python')
Parameters

  • name – String.

  • content – String

Returns

keywords(content)¶

Define keywords for search engine

Usage:

rptObj.headers.meta.keywords(['python', 'javascript'])

Related Pages:

https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_head.asp

param content

String or list with the keyword data

refresh(time)¶

Refresh document every X seconds

Usage:

rptObj.headers.meta.refresh(10)

Related Pages:

https://www.w3schools.com/tags/tag_meta.asp

param time

A time in second

viewport(value='width=device-width,height=device-height,initial-scale=1.0')¶

Setting the viewport to make your website look good on all devices

Usage:

rptObj.headers.meta.viewport("test")

Related Pages:

https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_head.asp

param value

Optional. A string with the view port content
